A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like: Absolutely amazing! There is significant growth in every character\, the power of the Force is on display in new and awe inspiring ways\, the fights and battles are jaw-dropping\, and it highlights the internal struggle between light and dark as well as how blurred that line can become better than any other SW film to date. There were two small scenes that felt forced and out of place\, but despite this\, it kept me on the edge of my seat for its entire 3hr runtime.
